entry.data:
SHOWERS AND SCATTERED THUNDERSTORMS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE SMALL HAIL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 60
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

NUMEROUS SHOWERS AND SCATTERED THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS AND SCATTERED THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE SMALL HAIL IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
